jobs.title: Technical Database Engineer
jobs.name: Google LLC
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced frontend developer to join our team and help us build responsive and scalable web applications. As a member of our development team, you will work closely with designers and other developers to create user-friendly interfaces and optimize website performance.
jobs.responsibility: Develop and maintain user-friendly and responsive web applications. Collaborate with designers and other developers to ensure the delivery of high-quality code. Optimize website performance and ensure cross-browser compatibility. Stay up-to-date with new frontend technologies and trends.
jobs.edu_requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer
jobs.name: Netflix
jobs.description: We are seeking a skilled backend developer to join our team and help us design and develop scalable and efficient server-side applications. As a member of our development team, you will work closely with other developers to optimize application performance and improve user experience.
jobs.responsibility: Design and develop scalable and efficient server-side applications. Collaborate with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration of frontend and backend. Optimize application performance and improve user experience. Stay up-to-date with new backend technologies and trends.
jobs.edu_requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.
